dcsl_low_level_control Documentation

dcsl_low_level_control: dcsl_low_level_control

The dcsl_low_level_control package contains dcsl_miabot_low_level_control node and dcsl_miabot_control_math library. This purpose of this package is to link output from high level control to low level velocity inputs for the swarm controller.

  • Homepage: http://ros.org/wiki/dcsl_low_level_control

dcsl_low_level_control

This package provides "low level control" for Miabot PRO robots from Merlin System Corp. Ltd. It forms an intermediate step between a "high level control" node and the actual Miabot driver node.

ROS API

List of nodes:

  • dcsl_miabot_low_level_control.cc

List of libraries:

  • dcsl_miabot_control_math.h

dcsl_miabot_low_level_control

This node subscribes to control inputs of waypoints or desired velocities in PoseArray form, and converts them to velocities in TwistArray form to send to swarm director node.

Usage

$ dcsl_miabot_low_level_control [options] [standard ROS args]
    options:        --way  listen for waypoint inputs (default)
                    --vel  listen for velocity inputs

ROS topics

Subscribes to (name / type):

  • "waypoint_input/PoseArray" : (waypoint mode) array "poses" holds desired pose waypoint for each robot.
  • "state_estimate/PoseArray" : (waypoint mode) array "poses" holds estimate of current pose for each robot.
  • "velocity_input/PoseArray" : (velocity mode) array "poses" holds desired velocity for each robot, with desired linear speed in m/s stored as position.x, and desired angular velocity in rad/s stored as orientation.z

Publishes to (name / type):

  • "cmd_vel_array/TwistArray" : array "twists" holds a Twist for each robot, linear.x is the desired linear speed in m/s; angular.z is the desired angular rotation rate in rad/s.

ROS parameters

  • "/n_robots" : Number of robots to be controlled.
  • "waypoint_gain_1" : Forward velocity gain for waypoint controller (default 0.7).
  • "waypoint_gain_2" : Angular velocity gain for waypoint controller (default 0.5).

dcsl_miabot_control_math

This is a C++ shared-object library that includes the math functions used in the dcsl_miabot_low_level_control package.
